page.title: 05LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN DURHAM
page.content: Most people have one or more hobbies. {Walking,}or following{sport}in general is most popular, followed by reading, knitting,music and gardening.Cooking, wine making,art and craft,flower arranging and amateur dramatics are less popular. Some people are involved in a church organisations but {Community Associations}and{Working {Men's Clubs}are strongly supported.The City also has thriving{Rowing,Rugby and{Cricket Clubs. More people spend free time watching {TV}at home than using local leisure facilities.The local{public house}is more popular than the local leisure centres.The{swimming pool & ice rink draw from a wide area,while{bingo {halls}serve the local community. People of all ages follow sporting events regularly.
